text: Joel McNeely (born March 28, 1959) is an American movie composer, arranger and conductor. He is best known for his film, video game and television scores. He frequently collaborates with George Lucas, Luc Besson, Stephen Sommers, Ron Howard, Dan Povenmire, Tom Ruegger, Steven Spielberg and Seth MacFarlane and contributes to various projects by Ubisoft, Nintendo and Nintendo. title: Joel McNeely
